meanings.definition: To discharge waste matter from the body.
meanings.sent1: The cat excretes in the litter box.
meanings.sent2: The body excretes waste through urine and feces.
meanings.sent3: The naughty puppy excretes on the carpet instead of outside.
meanings.sent4: The factory excretes pollutants into the river, harming the environment.
meanings.sent5: The volcano excretes molten lava, creating new landforms.

meanings.definition: To eliminate waste material from the body.
meanings.sent1: The bird excretes waste while flying.
meanings.sent2: The digestive system excretes undigested food as feces.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey excretes on unsuspecting passersby from the treetops.
meanings.sent4: The chimney excretes smoke into the sky, signaling the start of winter.
meanings.sent5: The body excretes toxins through sweat, keeping itself healthy.

meanings.definition: To release waste products from the body.
meanings.sent1: The fish excretes ammonia through its gills.
meanings.sent3: The alien creature excretes a glowing substance that lights up the dark cave.
meanings.sent4: The tree excretes sap to protect itself from insects.
meanings.sent5: The skin excretes oils to keep itself moisturized.
